name: Maxwells-Demons
tagline: PHY 494 midterm project by the team Maxwell's Demons
body:
# Maxwell's Demons  
@BobbyPhysics, @gvetaw, and @awarren9 are a team of computational physics students at ASU
## Current Project 
_________________________________________________________________
###Simulating Liquid Argon: A study in Python molecular dynamics
>**Abstract** Your project is to write, in teams of three students, a Python molecular 
dynamics (MD) code to simulate liquid Argon. We want to study how varying some of the
simulation parameters affects the accuracy of the simulations and extract thermodynamic
properties from the simulations. You will write a short “letter”-style paper to communicate,
discuss and summarize your reasoning and your results.

Due Tue, March 22, 2016, 1:30pm.
